title: Vehicle retail sales soar 27% in April; two-wheeler registrations jump 33%, cars up 16%
description: Vehicle registrations in the country – a proxy for retail sales – went up by a robust 27% year on year to 2.2 million units in April, led by two-wheelers on the back of stable fuel prices, positive outlook for the monsoons, Navratri demand, and the ongoing marriage season
